meanings.definition: The plural form of the currency unit of Costa Rica.
meanings.sent1: In Costa Rica, people use colones to buy things.
meanings.sent2: I exchanged my dollars for colones at the bank.
meanings.sent3: The vending machine only accepted colones, so I couldn't buy a snack.
meanings.sent4: Her piggy bank was overflowing with colones, like a treasure chest.
meanings.sent5: The sound of colones clinking together is music to my ears.

meanings.definition: A plural noun referring to the large intestine.
meanings.sent1: The doctor examined his colones during the check-up.
meanings.sent2: A healthy diet is important for maintaining the health of your colones.
meanings.sent3: He joked that his colones were working overtime after a big meal.
meanings.sent4: The colones are like a long tube that helps digest food.
meanings.sent5: She felt a pain in her colones after eating too much junk food.
